sigma_title: Script File Execution via WScript or CScript Tool
QRadar: (LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype)='Microsoft Windows Security Event Log' and EventID='4688' and (Image ilike '%\cscript.exe' or Image ilike '%\wscript.exe') and ("Process CommandLine" ilike '%.vbs%' or "Process CommandLine" ilike '%.js%' or "Process CommandLine" ilike '%//E:jscript%' or "Process CommandLine" ilike '%//E:vbscript%'))

sigma_title: Persistence by Adding a User to Local Administrator Group
QRadar: (LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype)='Microsoft Windows Security Event Log' and EventID='4732' and (GroupName='Administrators' or SecurityID='S-1-5-32-544'))

sigma_title: TCP Connection Creating via PowerShell Script
QRadar: (LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype)='Microsoft Windows Security Event Log' and EventID='4104' and (Message ilike '%Net.Sockets.TcpClient(%, %)%' or Message ilike '%Net.Sockets.TcpListener(%, %)%'))
(LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype)='Microsoft Windows Security Event Log' and EventID='4688' and ("Process CommandLine" ilike '% asktgt %/user:% /ptt%'))

sigma_title: Suspicious RC4 Encrypted Kerberos Service Ticket Request
QRadar: (LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype)='Microsoft Windows Security Event Log' and (EventID='4769' and "Ticket Encryption Type"='0x17' and "Ticket Options"='0x40810000' and "Failure Code"='0x0') and not (("Service Name" ilike '%$' or "Service Name" = 'krbtgt') and AccountName ilike '%$@%'))
(LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype)='Microsoft Windows Security Event Log' and EventID='4688' and ("Process CommandLine" ilike '%kerberoast%'))

sigma_title: Code Execution via Microsoft Build Engine
QRadar: (LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype)='Microsoft Windows Security Event Log' and EventID='4688' and Image ilike '%\MsBuild.exe')

sigma_title: Suspicious Credential Vault Client Library Load
QRadar: (LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype)='Microsoft Windows Security Event Log' and (EventID='7' and ImageLoaded ilike '%\vaultcli.dll') and not ((Image ilike '%\vaultcmd.exe' or Image ilike '%\explorer.exe')))

sigma_title: Execution Through Module Load via PowerShell
QRadar: (LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype)='Microsoft Windows Security Event Log' and (EventID = '4104' or EventID = '4103') and Message ilike '%Reflection%' and Message ilike '%Assembly%' and Message ilike '%Load%')

sigma_title: Symmetric Cryptography Encryptor and Decryptor Utilization via PowerShell
QRadar: (LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype)='Microsoft Windows Security Event Log' and (EventID = '4103' or EventID = '4104') and Message ilike '%Security%' and Message ilike '%Cryptography%' and (Message ilike '%CreateDecryptor%' or Message ilike '%CreateEncryptor%'))
(LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype)='Microsoft Windows Security Event Log' and EventID='4688' and Image ilike '%\csc.exe')

sigma_title: Suspicious DISM Core Framework Portable Executable Load
QRadar: (LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype)='Microsoft Windows Security Event Log' and (EventID='7' and (LoadedImage ilike '%\DismCore.dll')) and not ((LoadedImage ilike '%C:\Windows\System32\Dism\DismCore.dll%' or LoadedImage ilike '%C:\Windows\SysWOW64\Dism\DismCore.dll%')))
